author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: Qualcomm Technologies has announced its plan to acquire Arduino, marking a major development in the embedded and maker ecosystems. The acquisition aims to combine Qualcomm’s edge computing and AI expertise with Arduino’s large developer community and open hardware approach. As part of the announcement, both companies introduced the Arduino UNO Q, a new dual-processor development […]
title: Arduino UNO Q Combines Qualcomm Dragonwing QRB2210 and STM32 MCU
